snippet.title: Happy Sheepies Steam Wishlist Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2860450/Happy_Sheepies/?utm_source=ytb&utm_medium=ytb&utm_campaign=ytb

Happy Sheepies Demo: https://gx.games/games/3xipmu/happy-sheepies-demo/

DESCRIPTION:
Happy Sheepies is a relaxing sheep farming game that includes some Crafting and Business Management elements with its simple Drag & Drop gameplay. Meet the needs of your sheepies, craft and sell your products, and grow your business!
​
CONTROLS:
[Mouse Left]: Drag Items.
[Mouse Right]: Camera Pan.
[Mouse Wheel]: Zoom In / Out.
[1-2-3]: Toggle Game Speed.
[Space bar]: Pause /Market.
[Ctrl]: Sell Mode.

Berker Games 2024.
